nodes.bodyText: Could/should we do this in applyJavaNature and/or applyPortabilityNature to get the benefit for all built jars?
Good point. I added this to applyJavaNature since applyPortabilityNature also calls applyJavaNature.

(or something)
Ah yes I guess applyJavaNature is called in applyPortabilityNature already so this caputres both 👍
